attributes.action: More grants. For keyboard players during lockdown
attributes.background: Pls can the government give grants to employees who don't have money. Due to it is illegal to play by most venues

rejection.details:
The Government does not provide grants for particular groups of workers, such as keyboardists.

We could accept a petition calling for increased support for self-employed workers whose income has fallen as a result of Covid-19, if that's what you want to happen.
